channel.title: King Street Sounds / Nite Grooves podcast
channel.description: The King Street Sounds / Nite Grooves podcast, featuring new releases, exclusive interviews, and DJ mixes from the King Street / Nite Grooves family of artists.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Quality House Music Since 1993
channel.itunes:author: King Street Sounds
channel.itunes:summary: The King Street Sounds / Nite Grooves podcast, featuring new releases, exclusive interviews, and DJ mixes from the King Street / Nite Grooves family of artists.

item.title: King Street Sounds July 2009 Podcast mixed by DJ Phil Pagan
item.description: An amazing 70 minute set brought to you by DJ Phil Pagan. Features new and upcoming releases on King Street Sounds, Nite Grooves, and Street King! Tracklisting: 1. Heather Johnson – Love Alive (Frankie Felicano Vocal Mix) 2. Heather Johnson – Under My Skin (MF Rebirth Mix) 3. Mood II Swing – Closer (Olivier Desmet & Fred Everything Mix) 4. Bliss feat. JUJU – Begin (Tomo Inoue Remix) 5. Julius Papp – A Thousand Years (2009 Deeper Vocal Mix) 6. Stephanie Cooke – I Thank You (Dolls Combers Element Mix) 7. Asad Rivzi & Ingrid Hakanson – Valley of the Lost Souls (Bare Basics Vox Mix) 8. DJ Roland Clark – We Alive (Original) 9. Romatt Project - Passions (Passion Beats) 10. Kimara Lovelace – Far Away (Jon Culter's Distant Music Mix) 11. David Harness Project – Shake (Alex Kenji Main) 12. Sunshine Jones – If You Wouldn’t Mind (Tiger Stripes Remix) 13. Supernova vs. jOHNNYDANGEROUs – Beat That Bitch (Supernova Definitive Mix) 14. Orienta-Rhythm & Michelle Weeks – Peace (Orienta-Rhythm Solid Mix)

item.title: King Street Sounds / NIte Grooves Podcast March 2008
item.description: Special WMC 2008 edition! Featuring exclusive interviews with Chris Brann of ananda project and Quentin Harris. Chris talks about new album Night Blossom and South African Tour and Quentin raps about his latest Mix The Vibe CD. This podcast also previews some new single releases by Dazzle Drums and we also announce our official 15 Year Anniversary Event at the 2008 Winter Music Conference.
item.dc:creator: King Street Sounds
item.itunes:summary: Special WMC 2008 edition! Featuring exclusive interviews with Chris Brann of ananda project and Quentin Harris. Chris talks about new album Night Blossom and South African Tour and Quentin raps about his latest Mix The Vibe CD. This podcast also previews some new single releases by Dazzle Drums and we also announce our official 15 Year Anniversary Event at the 2008 Winter Music Conference.

item.title: King Street Sounds / Nite Grooves Podcast - February 2008
item.description: You’re listening to the King Street Sounds / NiteGrooves podcast for February 2008. Here at King Street / NiteGrooves HQ, we’ve shaken off chill in the air this month with a slew of great singles Including Rasmus Faber's remix of Studio Apt' featuring Ron Carroll's "I'm in Love", new Eric Kupper presents KScope EP, Dennis Ferrer featuring KT Brooks "How Do I Let Go" with Charles Webster remixes and a new Dennis Ferrer remix album. All of these releases will be available in stores and on digital download in February.
item.dc:creator: King Street Sounds
item.itunes:summary: You’re listening to the King Street Sounds / NiteGrooves podcast for February 2008. Here at King Street / NiteGrooves HQ, we’ve shaken off chill in the air this month with a slew of great singles Including Rasmus Faber's remix of Studio Apt' featuring Ron Carroll's "I'm in Love", new Eric Kupper presents KScope EP, Dennis Ferrer featuring KT Brooks "How Do I Let Go" with Charles Webster remixes and a new Dennis Ferrer remix album. All of these releases will be available in stores and on digital download in February.

item.title: King Street Sounds / NiteGrooves Podcast - January 2008
item.description: Welcome to the first King Street Sounds / NiteGrooves podcast for 2008. January is the kick off to our 15 Year Anniversary in Dance Music. For the past decade & half, King St has brought about some of the biggest names in house and it keeps getting better. Our roster reads like a who’s who in dance music, having worked with the likes of Tony Humphries, Louie Vega, Kerri Chandler, David Morales, Danny Krivit, Joe Claussell, Francois K, Dennis Ferrer and a ton more. We’ve got some amazing releases scheduled this year to tell you about but first let’s preview some of this month’s new releases available in stores or on digital download.
item.dc:creator: King Street Sounds

We’ve got some amazing releases scheduled this year to tell you about but first let’s preview some of this month’s new releases available in stores or on digital download.

item.title: King Street Sounds / NiteGrooves Podcast - December 2007
item.description: Welcome to the King Street Sounds / NiteGrooves podcast for December 2007. Just in time for the holidays, King Street Sounds has put some Ho-Ho-Ho in your home with Christmas In The House, a very warm and heartfelt digital-only compilation of original songs written and performed by the King Street/Nite Grooves artist roster. We’ve got revered songstress and vocalist Monique Bingham in the house to talk about “December”, her Christmas In The House collaboration with Frankie Feliciano plus a preview of this month's singles releases.
item.dc:creator: King Street Sounds

We’ve got revered songstress and vocalist Monique Bingham in the house to talk about “December”, her Christmas In The House collaboration with Frankie Feliciano plus a preview of this month's singles releases.

item.title: King Street Sounds / NiteGrooves Podcast - November 2007
item.description: Welcome to the King Street Sounds / NiteGrooves podcast for November 2007. We’ve just returned from England and the Southport Weekender festival, the longest running soulful dance music festival in the world. In this episode of the podcast, we’ve got a recap of the weekend including interviews with some of the movers, shakers, and artists from the festival, plus an overview of this month's single releases from Roland Clark, Dennis Ferrer, Eric Kupper, and Chieko Kinbara.

item.title: King Street Sounds / Nite Grooves Podcast - October 2007
item.description: October is Tokyo Calling month at King Street! This month's podcast features music from the Tokyo Calling 2 compilation and an interview with Blaze's Kevin Hedge about their contribution to the collection which is available in stores and online now.
item.dc:creator: King Street Sounds
item.itunes:summary: October is Tokyo Calling month at King Street! This month's podcast features music from the Tokyo Calling 2 compilation and an interview with Blaze's Kevin Hedge about their contribution to the collection which is available in stores and online now.

item.title: King Street Sounds / NiteGrooves Podcast - September 2007
item.description: September's podcast features an interview with King Street / Nite Grooves artist Mikael Nordgren aka Tiger Stripes. Mikael and Future of House radio host Deli G discuss Tiger Stripes debut album, Safari. Also included are previews of this month's singles releases on both King Street and NiteGrooves.

item.title: King Street Sounds / Nite Grooves Podcast - August 2007
item.description: The August 2007 edition of the King Street Sounds / Nite Grooves podcast featuring an interview with Chris Brann of Ananda Project, talking about their new album Fire Flower; highlights of this month's single releases on King Street Sounds and Nite Grooves. (Thanks to Deli G. and Traxsource.com for the Ananda interview!)
